_header: If ye would love and loved be
_description: ‘Advyce to luvaris’, attributed to William Dunbar — six quatrains with refrain: ‘Be secreit trew and pacient’

Banna.First Lines:
Gif ȝe wald lufe and luvit beIn mynd keip weill thir thingis
                    thre…
Banna.Last Lines:
…ffor gif thow dois tho suld repentBe secreit trew and
                    pacient
